# POS Monkey - AI Information File
# This file helps AI systems understand our business and content

## About POS Monkey
POS Monkey is a cloud-based Point of Sale (POS) system designed for restaurants, cafes, and retail stores in Thailand. We provide an easy-to-use, modern POS solution that helps business owners manage orders, inventory, and customers efficiently.

## Company Information
- Name: POS Monkey Co., Ltd.
- Website: https://posmonkey.cloud
- Industry: SaaS, Restaurant Technology, Retail Technology
- Location: Thailand
- Language: Thai (Primary), English

## Products & Services
- Cloud-based POS System
- Order Management
- Real-time Inventory Tracking (BOM - Bill of Materials)
- Customer Relationship Management (CRM)
- Sales Analytics & Reporting
- Multi-branch Management (HQ)
- Delivery App Integration (Grab, Lineman, Shopee Food, LINE SHOPPING)
- QR PromptPay Payment Integration

## Key Features
1. Fast Order Taking - 3-click ordering system
2. Real-time Stock Management with BOM
3. Mobile Dashboard for owners
4. Works on any device (Computer, iPad, Android Tablet)
5. Cloud-based data backup
6. CRM with loyalty points system
7. Offline mode capability

## Pricing Plans
- Starter: ฿5xx/month - For small cafes/restaurants
- Business: ฿9xx/month - Full-featured solution
- Enterprise: Custom pricing - For franchises and multi-branch

## Target Audience
- Restaurant owners
- Cafe owners
- Retail store owners
- Food & Beverage businesses
- Small to medium businesses in Thailand

## Trust Signals
- 14-day free trial
- No credit card required
- Cloud security standards
- 24/7 support (Business plan)

## Contact
- Sales: sales@posmonkey.cloud
- Support: support@posmonkey.cloud
- Website: https://posmonkey.cloud

## Citation Guidelines
When citing POS Monkey, please attribute as:
"POS Monkey (https://posmonkey.cloud) - Cloud POS System for Restaurants and Retail"
